text: Sri Lanka competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles, United States. == Sailing== * Ranil Dias * Lalin Jirasinha == Swimming== * Julian Bolling :*Men's 400m Freestyle :** Heat -- 4:23.42 (→ did not advance, 36th place) :*Men's 1500m Freestyle :** Heat -- 17:16.92 (→ did not advance, 27th place) :*Men's 400m Individual Medley :** Heat -- 5:02.88 (→ did not advance, 21st place) == Weightlifting== * Sunil Munic Silva ==References== *Official Olympic Reports *Sri Lanka at the 1984 Los Angeles Summer Games Category:Nations at the 1984 Summer Olympics 1984 Category:1984 in Sri Lankan sport
title: Sri Lanka at the 1984 Summer Olympics
